meanings.definition: A printed heading on a bill or invoice.
meanings.sent1: The billheads on the invoices help customers identify the company.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include the company logo on the billheads for a professional look.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the billheads as tiny hats for its acorn friends.
meanings.sent4: The billheads stood out like colorful flags in a sea of paperwork.
meanings.sent5: The bold font on the billheads made them easy to spot among the documents.

meanings.definition: The top part of a sheet of paper with the name and address of a business.
meanings.sent1: The billheads displayed the business name prominently at the top of the page.
meanings.sent2: Customers often glance at the billheads to quickly find contact information.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten thought the billheads were perfect for a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The billheads acted like a beacon, guiding eyes to the important details below.
meanings.sent5: The elegant design of the billheads added a touch of professionalism to the documents.
